trans-unit.source: Please choose the language to use during the installation of Siwapp
trans-unit.target: Prosimo izberite jezik ki ga boste uporabljali med namestitvijo

trans-unit.source: If any of these items are highlighted in red then please take actions to correct them
trans-unit.target: Če je karkoli obarvano rdeče odpravite pomankljivosti

trans-unit.source: Failure to do so could lead to your Siwapp installation not functioning correctly
trans-unit.target: Če pomankljivostio ne boste odpravili Siwapp morda ne bo deloval pravilno

trans-unit.source: These settings are recommended for PHP in order to ensure full compatibility with Siwapp
trans-unit.target: PHP nastavitve ki so priporočene za popolno kompatibilnost

trans-unit.source: However, Siwapp will still operate if your settings do not quite match the recommended
trans-unit.target: Mah, Siwapp bo še zmer delu, tud če ni isto kukr je priporočeno ;)

trans-unit.source: Enter your database connection details below.
trans-unit.target: Spodaj vnesite podatke o povezavi z podatkovno bazo

trans-unit.source: If you're not sure about these, contact your host.
trans-unit.target: Če o tem niste prepričani se posvetujte z gostiteljem spletne strani

trans-unit.source: php.ini has zend.ze1_compatibility_mode set to off
trans-unit.target: php.ini ima zend.ze1_compatibility_mode določen na off

trans-unit.source: Set zend.ze1_compatibility_mode to off in php.ini ([1])
trans-unit.target: Določite zend.ze1_compatibility_mode na off v php.ini ([1])

trans-unit.source: Install PDO (mandatory for Propel and Doctrine)
trans-unit.target: Namestite PDO (obvezno za Propel in Doctrine)

trans-unit.source: Install PDO drivers (mandatory for Propel and Doctrine)
trans-unit.target: Namestite PDO gonilnike (obvezno za Propel in Doctrine)

trans-unit.source: Install the PHP-XML module (required by Propel)
Install the XSL module (recommended for Propel)
Install a PHP accelerator like APC (highly recommended)
trans-unit.target: Namestite PHP accelerator kot je APC (zelo priporočamo)

trans-unit.source: php.ini has safe_mode set to off
trans-unit.target: php.ini ima safe_mode določen na off

trans-unit.source: php.ini has short_open_tag set to off
trans-unit.target: php.ini ima short_open_tag določen na off

trans-unit.source: php.ini has magic_quotes_gpc set to off
trans-unit.target: php.ini ima magic_quotes_gpc določen na off

trans-unit.source: php.ini has register_globals set to off
trans-unit.target: php.ini ima register_globals določen na off

trans-unit.source: php.ini has session.auto_start set to off
trans-unit.target: php.ini ima session.auto_start določen na off

trans-unit.source: Set safe_mode to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Določi safe_mode na off v php.ini

trans-unit.source: Set short_open_tag to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Določi short_open_tag na off v php.ini

trans-unit.source: Set magic_quotes_gpc to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Določi magic_quotes_gpc na off v php.ini

trans-unit.source: Set register_globals to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Določi register_globals na off v php.ini

trans-unit.source: Set session.auto_start to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Določi session.auto_start na off v php.ini

trans-unit.source: is Free Software released under the MIT license
trans-unit.target: je Free Software izdan pod MIT licenco

trans-unit.source: Can't connect to the database. Please review the data.
trans-unit.target: Ne morem vzpostaviti povezave z podatkovno bazo. Prosimo preverite podatke.

trans-unit.source: Enter the following information for the super administrator user:
If you want to preload the database with sample data, check the following checkbox.
trans-unit.target: Če hočete naložiti vzorčne podatke, naredite kljukico ;)

trans-unit.source: Click the "Finish" button to start the Siwapp application.
trans-unit.target: Klikni na Zaključi če hočete začeti uporabljati aplikacijo.

trans-unit.source: Please review the following error messages carefully and try to correct them before you continue.
trans-unit.target: Prosimo pazljivo preberite spodnje napake in jih odpravite pred nadaljevanjem.

trans-unit.source: Siwapp needs to have write permissions over certain files and directories
trans-unit.target: Siwapp mora imeti dovoljenja za dostop do določenih datotek in direktorijev
Jebemtiš, prišlo je do nekaterih napak

trans-unit.source: Once you've checked out the instructions above, click the "Finish" button to finish the installation process.
trans-unit.target: Ko ste prebrali zgornja navodila, kliknite Zaključi da zaključite z namestitvijo.

trans-unit.source: We couldn't write to %1% file. Please download it %2%here%3% and replace it at %4% by yourself
trans-unit.target: Ne morem pisati v %1% datoteko. Prosimo prenesite jo %2%here%3% in jo zamenjajte %4% ročno

trans-unit.source: PLEASE TAKE THE FOLLOWING SECURITY MEASURES:
Remove the write permissions of the %1% file
trans-unit.target: Odstrani dovoljenje za pisanje na datoteki %1%

trans-unit.source: There were some sql errors creating the database.
trans-unit.target: Prišlo je do sql napak pri kreiranju baze

trans-unit.source: The %1% directory exists and is writable
trans-unit.target: %1% direktorij obstaja in ima pravice pisanja

trans-unit.source: Make sure the %1% directory is writable (%2%)
trans-unit.target: Prepričaj se da je %1% direktorij zapisljiv (%2%)

trans-unit.source: There are some tables at your database that will be overwritten by the Siwapp installation process
trans-unit.target: Nekaj tabel v bazi bo prepisanih

trans-unit.source: You need to click the checkbox to allow the tables to be overwritten
trans-unit.target: Narediti morate kljukico če želite da bo baza prepisana.

trans-unit.source: The mod_rewrite apache module is available
